'''Aisha''' is a mentioned character who is a friend of [[Kathya]].

==Profile==
Aisha was a talented professor and researcher with the [[Amurta|Amurta Darshan]] of the [[Sumeru Akademiya]]. Twenty years before present, Professor Aisha gave Kathya a plant. Aisha was Kathya's tutor and a friend of her parents. Kathya describes Professor Aisha as an outstanding [[Amurta]] researcher. She was skilled in academics and combat. She worked a lot for the [[Adventurers' Guild]].

When Kathya was 10 years old, Aisha left to explore the secrets of the [[Abyss]]. Aisha left a seed to Kathya, saying that when it blooms, she would return. However, [[Nahida]] and the Traveler determined that the plant would never bloom. Nahida says that the plant was a new species Aisha created that was unknown to the Akademia.<ref>{{Ref/Quest|Dream of Falling}}</ref>

==Trivia==
* {{Lang|{{w|Aisha}}|ar=عائشة}} was the name of the third wife of the Islamic prophet {{w|Muhammad}}. She is portrayed as intelligent, curious, and scholarly.
